metadata.title: CVE-2024-8385 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A difference in the handling of StructFields and ArrayTypes in WASM couldbe used to trigger an exploitable type confusion vulnerability. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 130 and Firefox ESR < 128.2.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
